categories: Category:Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi

nodes.text: Dawn of the Jedi: The Prisoner of Bogan 2

Dawn of the Jedi: The Prisoner of Bogan 2 is the second issue in the Prisoner of Bogan story arc of the Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi comic book series and the seventh issue of the series in total. It is set in the earliest days of the Jedi Order, in a time before the polarization of the light and dark sides of the Force. This issue was released on December 19 2012.

As the Je'daii study the amazing Forcesaber of the banished Xesh, word spreads that he and his fellow prisoner on Bogan, Daegen Lok, have escaped the dark moon! The three young Je'daii who first encountered Xesh are teamed with Je'daii Masters to locate the prisoners and return them to Bogan...and prevent them from bringing about the mad vision that Lok has obsessively held to during his years of banishment...
